Reviews.Content: Exceptional Hotel and Staff       My room
Reviews.Author: WorldTravelers003

Reviews.Content: Loved it I booked the Villa Oriental through booking.com for a quick overnight work trip to Frankfurt the following day. I paid EUR115 for the night for a double room. The hotel itself is a very short walk from Frankfurt's main train station, so it's very central and convenient for all forms of transport. The hotel reception staff were excellent - very friendly and welcoming, spoke great English and check-in and check-out were a breeze. The rooms themselves are genuinely oriental in style - lots of dark, carved wood , bright colours, fabrics and tiles. I loved my room, especially the bathroom with its gorgeous mosaic tiling. The room and linen was very clean and I had a great night's sleep thanks to a very comfy bed, great pillows, and some jet lag. Best part of the hotel though, is the Persian restaurant downstairs. I had a late dinner there and the food was superb!!! The lovely guy at reception is happy to offer his suggestions on the menu, and also order for you if you are somewhat lacking in your command of the German language (like me). If you stay at the hotel, eat at the restaurant. In fact even if you don't stay at the hotel, eat at the restaurant. I was running late and didn't catch the included breakfast, but I did have a quick look at the breakfast room and really wished I had woken up earlier!I suspect that the style of this hotel won't suit everyone, so best to check it out on their website first, but I'll definitely be going back there the next time I'm in Frankfurt.
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaGirlLondon
